column3: Extraction - Extraction from the environment, at the source, primary industry only
Production - Manufacturing, processing, value-add processing, business to business service sector flows
Storage - Storage in the form of mass stockpiling, hubs, reserves
Distribution - Transportation, warehousing, last mile distribution
Retail - Retail in the form of last mile delivery
Consumption - Consumption by human end users, not companies or producers
Waste - Waste from both producers and consumers, including recycling and reuse
